name: Batman: Arkham Asylum
notes: Only installs the Epic Games Store. You'll need to install Batman: Arkham Asylum manually.

task.description: Installing various fixes. This might take a while...
task.name: winetricks
task.app: winxp dotnet20 dotnet35 physx mdx d3dx9 d3dcompiler_43

content:
files:
- epic: https://launcher-public-service-prod06.ol.epicgames.com/launcher/api/installer/download/EpicGamesLauncherInstaller.msi
- audio: https://lutris.net/files/tools/directx-2010.tar.gz
- mfinstaller: https://github.com/z0z0z/mf-install/archive/master.zip
game:
  arch: win32
  args: -opengl
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Epic Games/Launcher/Portal/Binaries/Win32/EpicGamesLauncher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/dxsetup
    file: audio
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/mfinstaller
    file: mfinstaller
- execute:
    command: $CACHE/mfinstaller/install-mf.sh
    env:
      WINEPREFIX: $GAMEDIR
    terminal: true
- task:
    arch: win32
    args: /silent
    executable: $CACHE/dxsetup/DXSETUP.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: arial dotnet48
    arch: win32
    description: Installing dependencies
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- copy:
    dst: $CACHE/epic/
    src: epic
- task:
    arch: win32
    args: /i "$CACHE/epic/EpicGamesLauncherInstaller.msi" /q
    exclude_processes: EpicGamesLauncher.exe
    executable: msiexec
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: winxp dotnet20 dotnet35 physx mdx d3dx9 d3dcompiler_43
    arch: win32
    description: Installing various fixes. This might take a while...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    silent: false
system:
  env:
    MESA_GL_VERSION_OVERRIDE: 4.4COMPAT
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
